title: Skills Tracking Section Format Inconsistent
description: The enhanced skills tracking section with team performance table doesn't always render in production reports.
expectedBehavior: Should always show enhanced format with individual skill breakdown by category, team performance table, and detailed calculation explanations
actualBehavior: Sometimes shows old format without team table and detailed breakdown
suggestedFix: May be related to caching or report generation timing. Consider cache invalidation strategy when report format changes.
